pages.text: Bendalloy spikes steal the spiritual feruchemical powers: $(p)Feruchemically storing and tapping $(l:feruchemy:feruchemy/feruchemical_aluminum)Aluminum$(), $(l:feruchemy:feruchemy/feruchemical_duralumin)Duralumin$(), $(l:feruchemy:feruchemy/feruchemical_chromium)Chromium$() and $(l:feruchemy:feruchemy/feruchemical_nicrosil)Nicrosil$(), the feruchemical attributes keyed to each of these are:  $(p)Identity(making identityless metalminds), Connection(Bad omen/Hero of the village), Fortune(Bad luck/luck), and Investiture(Charge can be used for tapping other metals)
